snippet: Microsoft Word is full of keyboard shortcuts to help speed things along as you work. Although the Web has plenty of pages listing the shortcuts, you can also generate your own chart right from the Word program itself.
abstract: Microsoft Word is full of keyboard shortcuts to help speed things along as you work. Although the Web has plenty of pages listing the shortcuts, you can also generate your own chart right from the Word program itself.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Make Your Own Shortcuts in Word
